title: CPR (Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation)
content:
1. Call emergency number.
2. Push hard and fast in the center of the chest.
3. Give rescue breaths if trained.
4. Continue until help arrives.

title: Snake Bite Treatment
content:
1. Keep the patient calm and still.
2. Remove jewelry and tight clothing.
3. Position the bite below heart level.
4. Clean the wound with water.
5. Do NOT cut or suck the wound.

title: Dehydration & Heatstroke
content:
Signs: Dry mouth, dizziness, dark urine.
Action: Drink water in small sips. Move to a cool, shaded area. Loosen clothing. Cool the body with water.

title: Starting a Fire
content:
1. Gather tinder (dry grass, leaves), kindling (small twigs), and fuel (logs).
2. Create a tepee or log cabin structure.
3. Light the tinder from upwind.
4. Gradually add larger wood.

title: Water Purification
content:
1. Boiling: Boil water for at least 1 minute.
2. Chemical: Use iodine or chlorine tablets.
3. Filtration: Use a portable water filter or cloth layers for debris.
